Description: Records, products and/or outputs available from systematic surveys, and/or with qualified observers/personnel, including records vetted through peer-review processes. These records include data products available in the Species At Risk GIS tool, which provides the authoritative source of information for Species At Risk.
Usage: These records are high quality, and come from reliable sources.

Description: Records, products and/or outputs available from a mix of opportunistic and systematic surveys, quality control has been applied, although additional work is required to verify information.
Usage: Use with caution and, where possible, validate inference with data assigned to the high quality tier.

Description: Primarily opportunistic surveys that have not been through a quality control process, or results of invalidated models. Data quality protocols and validation are required.
Usage: Use only if data in high/medium tiers confirms or validates information from this tier. Very high uncertainty.
